snippet: Baylor has been fined $5,000 for NCAA football recruiting violations, the latest blow for a program trying to pick up the pieces from a sexual assault scandal and struggles on the field....
lead_paragraph: Baylor has been fined $5,000 for NCAA football recruiting violations, the latest blow for a program trying to pick up the pieces from a sexual assault scandal and struggles on the field.

headline.main: NCAA: Baylor Penalized for Football Recruiting Violations
headline.print_headline: NCAA: Baylor Penalized for Football Recruiting Violations
